DOC.brief_title: Organization Teratology Information Services ( OTIS ) Autoimmune Diseases Pregnancy Project
DOC.detailed_description: This pregnancy registry cohort study conduct Organization Teratology Information Specialists ( OTIS ) network university health department base telephone information center serve pregnant woman health care provider throughout North America . Participants first two cohort recruit concurrently caller OTIS center , health care provider direct consumer marketing effort . The source historical control archive data pregnancy follow California Teratogen Information Service 's Clinical Research Program locate University California San Diego .
DOC.criteria: Cohort 1 Eligible subject currently pregnant woman reside US Canada exposure etanercept treatment Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) , Juvenile RA , Ankylosing Spondylitis ( AS ) , Psoriatic Arthritis ( PsoA ) Psoriasis ( PsO ) time first trimester pregnancy define period first day last menstrual period ( i.e. , within two week conception ) include 12th week first day last menstrual period ( LMP ) Eligible subject must documentation exposure etanercept first trimester pregnancy . Cohort 2 Eligible subject currently pregnant woman reside US Canada take etanercept TNF antagonist treatment RA , JRA , AS , PsoA PsO time current pregnancy within two month prior first day last menstrual period ( LMP ) . Cohort 3 Eligible subject pregnant woman reside US Canada diagnose RA , JRA , AS , PsoA PsO expose know human teratogen index pregnancy .
